item.title: Tuesday Push – Crewger – Bringing Film Crews together
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Crewger is an organisation dedicated to the advancement of the Irish film community by facilitating the production, promotion and exhibition of original content by film-makers of all ages and backgrounds working in Ireland today. With all the activity @ Film Making in Ireland [The Commitments please…] – Crewger is an excellent resource for the Film [...]
item.content:encoded:
Crewger is an organisation dedicated to the advancement of the Irish film community by facilitating the production, promotion and exhibition of original content by film-makers of all ages and backgrounds working in Ireland today.

With all the activity @ Film Making in Ireland [The Commitments please…] – Crewger is an excellent resource for the Film Industry community in Ireland.

Damien has a more in-depth review
